cards.name: Five Of Clubs
cards.meaning: Five is thumbmaster! Not quite implemented yet...

cards.name: Six Of Clubs
cards.meaning: Six is someone who is male!

cards.name: Seven Of Clubs
cards.meaning: Seven is heaven, not quite implemented...

cards.name: Eight Of Clubs
cards.meaning: Eight is mate, choose a partner!

cards.name: Nine Of Clubs
cards.meaning: Nine is rhyme - do a rhyme in player order!

cards.name: Ten Of Clubs
cards.meaning: 10 is categories - do categories in player order!

cards.name: Jack Of Clubs
cards.meaning: New rule! Think of a new rule!

cards.name: King Of Clubs
cards.meaning: Add drink to the king's cup!

cards.name: Queen Of Clubs
cards.meaning: Questionmaster - if someone answers your question, you drink!
